00077 status_t  TMPS001_StartMeasurement(void) 
00078 {
00079   uint32_t Result = TMPS001_FAIL;
00080   /* <<<DD_TMPS001_API_2>>> */
00081   do 
00082   {
00083         if (((SCU_GENERAL->DTSCON & SCU_GENERAL_DTSCON_PWD_Msk) >> \
00084                   SCU_GENERAL_DTSCON_PWD_Pos) == 1 )
00085         {
00086           Result = TMPS001_FAIL ;
00087           break ;
00088         }
00089     if(((SCU_GENERAL->DTSSTAT & SCU_GENERAL_DTSSTAT_BUSY_Msk)>>\
00090          SCU_GENERAL_DTSSTAT_BUSY_Pos) == 1 )
00091     {
00092       Result = TMPS001_BUSY ;
00093       break ;
00094     }
00095 
00096     while (!(SCU_GENERAL->DTSSTAT & SCU_GENERAL_DTSSTAT_RDY_Msk)) 
00097     {
00098         }
00099     /* starts a measurement of the DTS. */
00100     SET_BIT (SCU_GENERAL->DTSCON, 1) ;
00101     Result = DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00102       
00103   }while (0) ;
00104   return Result;    
00105 }
00106 
00107 
00108 status_t  TMPS001_GetStatus(void)
00109 {
00110   uint32_t Result = TMPS001_FAIL;
00112   do
00113   {
00114     if (((SCU_GENERAL->DTSCON & SCU_GENERAL_DTSCON_PWD_Msk) >> \
00115           SCU_GENERAL_DTSCON_PWD_Pos) == 1 )
00116     {
00117           Result = TMPS001_FAIL ; 
00118       break ;
00119     }
00120     if(((SCU_GENERAL->DTSSTAT & SCU_GENERAL_DTSSTAT_BUSY_Msk)>>\
00121          SCU_GENERAL_DTSSTAT_BUSY_Pos) == 1 )
00122     {
00123       Result = TMPS001_BUSY ;
00124       break ;
00125     }
00126     if  (((SCU_GENERAL->DTSSTAT & SCU_GENERAL_DTSSTAT_RDY_Msk) >>\
00127            SCU_GENERAL_DTSSTAT_RDY_Pos) == 1 )
00128     {
00129       Result =  TMPS001_READY ;
00130     }
00131   } while (0) ;
00132   return Result ;    
00133 }
00134      
00135 uint32_t  TMPS001_ReadTemp (void) 
00136 {
00137    uint32_t Temp = 0;
00138   /* <<<DD_TMPS001_API_4>>> */
00139   do
00140   {
00141         if (((SCU_GENERAL->DTSCON & SCU_GENERAL_DTSCON_PWD_Msk) >> \
00142             SCU_GENERAL_DTSCON_PWD_Pos) == 1 )
00143     {
00144       break ;
00145     }
00146     if(((SCU_GENERAL->DTSSTAT & SCU_GENERAL_DTSSTAT_BUSY_Msk)>>\
00147          SCU_GENERAL_DTSSTAT_BUSY_Pos) == 1 )
00148     {
00149       break ;
00150     }
00151         Temp  = (SCU_GENERAL->DTSSTAT  & SCU_GENERAL_DTSSTAT_RESULT_Msk);
00152         if(Temp != 0 )
00153         Temp  = (Temp - 596 )/ 2.03 ;
00154   }while(0) ;
00155   
00156   return Temp;
00157 }
